abstract: Acer is now the No. 2 PC maker in the world, after Hewlett-Packard. Acer also moved past Apple in the American market.
snippet: Acer is now the No. 2 PC maker in the world, after Hewlett-Packard. Acer also moved past Apple in the American market.
lead_paragraph: Well, there it is. A non-American company has managed to become the second-largest computer seller for the first time in history.
